title: Report: Nintendo Switch 2 Launches June - Kinda Funny Games Daily 03.25.25

Big Nintendo Switch 2 launch reports, Everybody’s scared of GTA 6, and Geoff Keighley launches a game publication.

Today after, KFGD, you’ll get:
- GAMESCAST - A Crimson Desert preview and more
- After Gamescast is Kinda Funny Podcast where Greg talks about going to the Last of Us premiere
- Then the STREAM is Pokemon Nuzlocke
